short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shrinks or removes the header on https://www.nytimes.com/crosswords/* and https://www.nytimes.com/puzzles/*.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The new header at https://www.nytimes.com/crosswords takes up a lot of precious screen space that could be better used for crossword puzzles!

This extension replaces the large header with the old, smaller header on all URL paths starting with "/crosswords/" served from www.nytimes.com.

You can also hide the header entirely! Simply activate this extension with either a click on the extension icon or by invoking the keyboard shortcut. By default, the shortcut is Ctrl + Shift + H.

Activating the extension a second time will bring the header back. This can be useful when you need to navigate to a different page.
